pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Small Collection of Geometries, and Stats for 'ggplot2' // A collection of geometries and stats for 'ggplot2'. Currently it supports geom_pointless() which adds minimal emphasis to your plots. Or just some visual sugar. geom_lexis() draws a 45 lifeline of an event that mimics lexis diagrams. geom_chaikin() applies Chaikin's corner cutting algorithm to a path.
